_sText:
Cs_eglan_final is created by Robin Brummans (Hamster) and Rutger Wink.
I did the brushwork, Rutger Wink made the textures.

We made the map for a Lan-party on our school.
On the Lan-party itself, the map was a succes. Many people liked it.


About the map:
cs_eglan is based on a shopping mall near the school. 
It is a pretty simple map, but you can go many way's as either a Terrorist or a Counterterrorist.
there are 2 ''long'' streets. 1 is good for sniping, the other one is good for closer combat.
There is a garage, and a tunnel system..
I get with my pc (7600gt, 2gb memory, 3200+) 60fps on the map. I have no FPS drops.

The map is 20mb big, including custom textures.

Notes:
- There are still some things that aren't very good, but we only had 3 weeks to make the map from scratch.
- This is the first time that I create a ''realistic'' map. Please provide constructive feedback!.

Have fun with it.
Hamster out.

Notice the feedback instructions.
I thank Chizbone for improving the .Nav file.
